name: ZEROSUN
description:
Princess Sun has run away, and King Lunar has a mission for you. In ZEROSUN, delve deep through the rings of the underworld, solving strange contraptions, chatting with the denizens of the strange world, and slaying wicked beasts who make it their mission to slay you, all to rescue the runaway princess. Pulling off a skill based PASSION move will net you TASTY results, and send your foes running. 

FEATURES:
9 Rings of the underworld for you to explore

A cast of otherworldy abominations for you to get attached to

A simple plot, who needs details?

Lovely commentary from your sentient left arm

Moderate to severe puzzlery.

AND MORE!
